Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems (ABI) 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel for qualitative detection, subtyping, and surveillance of human influenza viruses using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection of influenza virus type A or B and subtyping of seasonal human influenza A viruses (A/H1, A/H3, A/H1pdm09) from human respiratory specimens or viral culture, presumptive identification of A/H5, and epidemiologic surveillance, using real-time RT-PCR on the ABI 7500 Fast Dx platform in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological information.
